[vc_row el_class=”masonry-portfolio location-portfolio” css=”.vc_custom_1563615609227{padding-top: 50px !important;padding-bottom: 70px !important;}”][vc_column css=”.vc_custom_1515636297694{padding-top: 0px !important;}”][vc_row_inner equal_height=”yes” content_placement=”middle” gap=”25″][vc_column_inner width=”1/2″ offset=”vc_col-lg-8 vc_col-md-6″]

[/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/2″ offset=”vc_col-lg-4 vc_col-md-6″]

Beaumaris Design and Website Development

If you’re thinking of having a striking website for your business in Beaumaris, Confetti Design creates the most attractive yet functional websites in Melbourne. You may be running a physical shop in Reserve Road or a store near North Concourse, or you might be operating your e-commerce website in your home-based office near Beach Road— Confetti Design can help you with your website development needs. We tailor fit your website pages to cater to your specific Beaumaris customer profile.

[vc_empty_space height=”15px”][vc_column_text]VIEW MORE OF OUR WORK[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row row_content_width=”grid” css=”.vc_custom_1513007553262{padding-top: 5% !important;padding-bottom: 5% !important;background-position: center !important;background-repeat: no-repeat !important;background-size: cover !important;}” el_class=”confetti-sep”][vc_column]
[vc_column_text el_class=”text-not-caps”]

Confetti Design Services in Beaumaris

[/vc_column_text][vc_empty_space][vc_column_text css=”.vc_custom_1564010758410{padding-right: 5% !important;padding-left: 5% !important;}”]

From designing your e-commerce website in Beaumaris to developing a brand that sells, we have all your design and website development needs to help you succeed in your business.

[/vc_column_text][vc_empty_space height=”25px”][vc_separator color=”custom” el_width=”10″ accent_color=”#ca0043″][vc_empty_space height=”65px”]

[vc_row_inner el_class=”services-location”][vc_column_inner width=”1/4″]

Web Design

[vc_column_text]

Looking for good designers and professional developers? Confetti Design offers a hands on design and development Service that will help you accomplish an amazing client experience resulting in great conversions.

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/4″]

Branding

[vc_column_text]We provide more than just website development, your branding matters and we can ensure you present a consistent online brand. Making sure all your customer touch-points present the same brand messaging and visuals is our passion.[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/4″]

SEO

[vc_column_text]Getting your site within the first 3 positions on the first page of Google is every businesses goal. We ensure your website goes live with best practise optimisation and then, if you are serious about ranking, we can help. Our SEO partner is the best Melbourne based Search Engine Optimisation company we know.[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/4″]

Shopify Developer

[vc_column_text]Shopify is one of the best platforms for e-commerce, no doubt and we are the right people to help you with your online business.[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row full_width=”stretch_row” css=”.vc_custom_1563672626485{padding-top: 50px !important;padding-bottom: 50px !important;background-color: #ffffff !important;}” el_class=”location-slider-portfolio”][vc_column css=”.vc_custom_1563592372523{padding-top: 0px !important;}”]

5 Factors to Consider Before You Start With Web Development for your Business in Beaumaris

Now that you have decided that you need a website for your Beaumaris business, Confetti Design has listed the basic factors that you’ll need to consider when starting for your web design and website development for your business or e-commerce website.

[vc_column_text]

Creating an impactful website for your business might not be as simple as you thought but trust that Confetti Design’s got your back.

Our experienced team will know exactly how to create a website that not only looks appealing but also is functional and converting.

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row full_width=”stretch_row_content_no_spaces” equal_height=”yes” css=”.vc_custom_1563603813437{padding-top: 0px !important;padding-bottom: 0px !important;background-position: center !important;background-repeat: no-repeat !important;background-size: cover !important;}” el_class=”text-white steps location-factors”][vc_column width=”1/3″ css=”.vc_custom_1564012756210{margin-top: 0px !important;margin-bottom: 0px !important;padding-top: 100px !important;padding-right: 5px !important;padding-bottom: 100px !important;padding-left: 5px !important;background-image: url(https://confettidesign.com.au/wp-content/uploads/2017/08/steps_01.jpg?id=10889) !important;background-position: center !important;background-repeat: no-repeat !important;background-size: cover !important;}” el_class=”text-bg1 text-plus”][vc_column_text css=”.vc_custom_1564541679310{margin-right: 5% !important;margin-bottom: 0px !important;margin-left: 5% !important;}”]

A perfect domain name

Your domain name is one of the vital elements of your business website, so make sure you choose it well as it is part of your overall branding. Aim for a domain name that is 6-14 characters long. The shorter your domain name is, the easier for your customers to remember it. Avoid using numbers and hyphens in your domain name. You can also include Melbourne, Beaumaris, or your local area name if you are targeting local customers. Confetti Design provides domain name suggestions that will not only captivate your customers but will make them remember you..

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][vc_column width=”1/3″ css=”.vc_custom_1564012775554{margin-top: 0px !important;margin-bottom: 0px !important;padding-top: 100px !important;padding-right: 5px !important;padding-bottom: 100px !important;padding-left: 5px !important;background-image: url(https://confettidesign.com.au/wp-content/uploads/2017/08/steps_02.jpg?id=10890) !important;background-position: center !important;background-repeat: no-repeat !important;background-size: cover !important;}” el_class=”text-bg2 text-plus”][vc_column_text css=”.vc_custom_1564541712781{margin-right: 5% !important;margin-bottom: 0px !important;margin-left: 5% !important;}”]

Your audience demographics

Think about the customers that you are targeting. Are you creating a website for customers who are visiting Beaumaris? Or the ones already living there (to get repeat customers)? Are you targeting a specific area since you have a physical business store in Beaumaris? Or you are targeting an online audience of common interest and the location does not matter? In Confetti Design’s Clarity Process, these will be defined very carefully and you will also be guided every step of the way!

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][vc_column width=”1/3″ css=”.vc_custom_1564012801351{margin-top: 0px !important;margin-bottom: 0px !important;padding-top: 100px !important;padding-right: 5px !important;padding-bottom: 100px !important;padding-left: 5px !important;background-image: url(https://confettidesign.com.au/wp-content/uploads/2017/08/steps_03.jpg?id=10891) !important;background-position: center !important;background-repeat: no-repeat !important;background-size: cover !important;}” el_class=”text-bg3 text-plus”][vc_column_text css=”.vc_custom_1564541785330{margin-right: 5% !important;margin-bottom: 0px !important;margin-left: 5% !important;}”]

Main navigation

It is not wise to crowd your main navigation menu, so wisely think about the options that you will present to the customer of your Beaumaris business. Ponder on what they need and what you can offer to them. Ensure that there is a section that they can browse and do their credibility check of your business. Confetti Design had created hundreds of websites with attractive and functional navigation menus and will help you build yours for your website.

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row full_width=”stretch_row_content_no_spaces” equal_height=”yes” css=”.vc_custom_1563603813437{padding-top: 0px !important;padding-bottom: 0px !important;background-position: center !important;background-repeat: no-repeat !important;background-size: cover !important;}” el_class=”text-white steps location-factors”][vc_column width=”1/2″ css=”.vc_custom_1564016241030{margin-top: 0px !important;margin-bottom: 0px !important;padding-top: 100px !important;padding-right: 5px !important;padding-bottom: 100px !important;padding-left: 5px !important;background-image: url(https://confettidesign.com.au/wp-content/uploads/2017/07/steps_03.jpg?id=10585) !important;background-position: center !important;background-repeat: no-repeat !important;background-size: cover !important;}” el_class=”text-bg1 text-plus”][vc_column_text css=”.vc_custom_1564541823614{margin-right: 5% !important;margin-bottom: 0px !important;margin-left: 5% !important;}”]

The color schemes

You might be wondering why choosing a color for your e-commerce or business website is important. The reason is that the color and hues you’ll choose are part of your future branding and marketing strategies. Consider the niche of your business as well as your target audience. Colors can evoke distinctive emotional reactions, so you need to choose carefully. Confetti Design’s expertise in helping you choose the color scheme that compels your target audience in Beaumaris came from years of experience in understanding different customer profile.

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][vc_column width=”1/2″ css=”.vc_custom_1564016338573{margin-top: 0px !important;margin-bottom: 0px !important;padding-top: 100px !important;padding-right: 5px !important;padding-bottom: 100px !important;padding-left: 5px !important;background-image: url(https://confettidesign.com.au/wp-content/uploads/2017/08/confetti-design-business-essentials-set-up.jpg?id=10900) !important;background-position: center !important;background-repeat: no-repeat !important;background-size: cover !important;}” el_class=”text-bg2 text-plus”][vc_column_text]

Your competition

Analysing your competitors’ websites can give you an idea on what works and what doesn’t for the line of business you’re both in. Wear the customer’s hat while browsing through their website. Gather the good points of your competitor’s website and turn the bad points into good ones when you’re creating your website for your business website in Beaumaris. Confetti Design will also give you valuable advise and brainstorm with you as we start building your website.

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row full_width=”stretch_row” css=”.vc_custom_1563672634345{padding-top: 5% !important;padding-bottom: 5% !important;background-color: #ffffff !important;background-position: center !important;background-repeat: no-repeat !important;background-size: cover !important;}” el_class=”confetti-sep gray-bg”][vc_column][vc_column_text css=”.vc_custom_1563672955784{padding-top: 0px !important;padding-bottom: 10px !important;}”]

Testimonials

[/vc_column_text][vc_column_text css=”.vc_custom_1564541948811{padding-top: 0px !important;padding-bottom: 5% !important;}”]

Confetti Design caters to clients from Beaumaris, Brighton, St. Kilda, and nearby areas. Our unparalleled web design and development services have proven to work with our clients!

Below are the small business web design testimonials from our valued clients.

[/vc_column_text][vc_row_inner el_class=”testimonial-location”][vc_column_inner css=”.vc_custom_1563673835832{margin-top: 50px !important;margin-bottom: 50px !important;padding-right: 0px !important;padding-left: 0px !important;}”]

Stacey Currie

I had been quoted from $1k to $10k, I had no idea who to trust. Luckily I was referred by someone I trust 100%, who trust Johannah 100%, and I know why. I am very grateful.

Stacey Currie

I still can’t believe my vision is here; I feel extremely proud of my new website and branding. I felt embarrassed of my old branding but now I am so proud to share what Johannah and the team created.

Personal Brand Expert

One feature I loved was Johannah's availability and prompt response to any query no matter how big or small. Confetti's service is always with genuine smile and her positive attitude and outlook made the process fun!

Suzie Lightfoot

Coach Central

I am impressed with how well Johannah nailed my brief without one face-to-face meeting. I highly recommend her to create a website you will love.

Cindy Turner

Wedding Honey

Johannah has produced a beautiful and effective new website for our small business in a short amount of time. Her professionalism, kindness and encouragement is appreciated.

Ray & Sharon Tolcher

Miei Fiori

Johannah took her time to understand our vision before coming back with suggestions that not only meet our requirements but are relevant, current and forward in it's application.

Rob Greca & Lyly Greca

Sarah Trevathan Coach

The process has been stress-free and actually very enjoyable! I'm also delighted with the finished result of my website.

Sarah Trevathan

What's My Style

I regularly receive compliments on my branding, website and the stunning business cards and cannot recommend Johannah and Confetti Designs highly enough.

Nicky McMillan
[/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][vc_empty_space height=”60px”][vc_column_text]

Contact us for an instant over-the-phone quote.

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row]
